bullets:
Developed a secure, lightweight banking system from the ground up using Java, JDBC, and SQL, focusing on
core transaction logic and data integrity.

Implemented key features including user authentication, account creation, balance inquiry, and fund transfers,
successfully handling over 1,000+ simulated transactions during testing.

Designed and integrated a transaction history module that improved data retrieval times by 20% through
optimized SQL queries and indexing strategies.

Engineered a full-stack web application connecting farmers with equipment providers, featuring role-based access
for Admins, Owners, and Farmers to ensure secure and distinct functionality.

Built a real-time booking and equipment management module using Java and AJAX, reducing manual coor-
dination efforts by an estimated 50%.

Created a normalized SQL database to manage equipment listings, user profiles, and rental histories, ensuring
efficient and reliable data access for all user roles.
items.name: AgriRend: Agriculture Equipment Rental Application
items.summary:
Tech Stack: Java, SQL, HTML, CSS
Completed May 2024

bullets:
Constructed a functional e-commerce platform enabling users to browse products, manage a shopping cart, and
simulate a checkout process using Java Servlets and JSP.

Developed the backend logic to handle inventory management and order processing, capable of supporting a
catalog of over 500+ items within a robust SQL database.

Enhanced user experience by implementing dynamic product pages and a persistent shopping cart using session
management, leading to a 15% increase in user engagement metrics during testing.
items.name: E-Commerce Web Application
items.summary:
Tech Stack: Java Servlets, JSP, SQL, HTML, CSS
